headline: Why Builders FirstSource (BLDR) Is Up 15.0% After US Mortgage-Bond Plan Boosts Housing Sentiment
summary: In early January 2026, Builders FirstSource drew attention after a White House plan for a US$200 billion mortgage-bond purchase and stronger housing starts data improved sentiment toward housing-related businesses. An institutional investor’s focus on Builders FirstSource’s free cash flow, acquisitions, and sizeable share repurchases underscored how its capital allocation approach is central to its appeal.
